document.full_text: sony corp has defended its response to a massive internet security breach in a letter to connecticut senator richard blumenthal, who has accused the company of dragging its feet in notifying consumers.
document.title: sony defends speed of notification of data breach
lines_and_colors: sony corp has defended its response to a massive internet security breach in a letter to connecticut senator richard blumenthal, who has accused the company of dragging its feet in notifying consumers.
